name: peppermint
text: I was not glad that I did this.

name: havenless
text: Fuck you.

name: chaesar
text: Your icon totally wraps that up in a nice package it does.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, ShemmJacc, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, trisha, Kleptonis, aquamuffin, Sweetlips, MortisInvictus, aHatOfPig, plusigot125, mystkmanat, Doc_Rostov, LiquidCruelty)

name: goocifer
text: And then kicked one of us in the chest plate.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, ezcmac, karljw, StoatLad, Thorfinn, ohmygooses, solobuttons, hcaz, king_of_pwns, trisha, NDCaesar, aHatOfPig, Magb, Zem, Methadone, LiquidCruelty, Appers, kestral)

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, ezcmac, karljw, StoatLad, Thorfinn, redion, ohmygooses, solobuttons, hcaz, king_of_pwns, trisha, NDCaesar, aHatOfPig, Setzkin, Zem, LiquidCruelty, Appers, kestral)

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, ezcmac, StoatLad, Thorfinn, ohmygooses, solobuttons, hcaz, king_of_pwns, trisha, NDCaesar, aHatOfPig, aesop_punk, Magb, Zem, Methadone, LiquidCruelty, HomeSkool, kestral)

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lolsworth, Sweetlips, ohnoadeathray)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Fuck you.

name: pogo
text: A comment left by pogo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kenthegod, zpa, jezebel, kestral)

name: farqussus
text: You mean ASCEND BODILY TO HEAVEN YOU

name: shutup_shutup
text: The Crucifixion is observed on a Friday actually.  Good Friday was the original Fuck You Friday.

name: pogo
text: What's so good about it, then?

name: tekende
text: One man died to save us all from sin. That's pretty good.

name: greenkoolayd
text: woah.  i just imagined you posting that in a heartfelt way.  it made me shudder.

name: draykid
text: jesus that's actually pretty terrifying.

name: karljw
text: I had to lame 2 of them so that all 3 would have the same number of chubbies and lames. i am proud of this.

name: redion
text: I lamed "IS" just as a Fuck You ;)

name: saint
text: I love how he responds to the drive-thru person..."No. Fuck you." In my mind, he says it all as if telling the person "that's all," and the tone makes it all the better. Come enjoy how it sounds in my head with me.

name: lexsenthur
text: Fuck you, I will.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i don't like it that way. i'm more a fan of him saying a blunt and low 'no, fuck you'.

name: rykan
text: "Fuck along, now".

name: gunsofray
text: fuck yes. No .. i mean.. fuck no .. i mean, fuck you, yes, i will.

name: ketelcat
text: Perfect avatar, dude.

name: jimmyjimmy
text:
Unlike most of us, Ray is able to emote a polite congeniality whilst dropping the closing f-bomb.
Let us all celebrate the "Fuck You Friday" each and every week.

name: craigola
text: This is important. A fuck you is a fuck you, but there's no need to be rude about it.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Respect.

name: machegav
text: Again, strange going through the archives, reading your posts, and then suddenly, today, everything CLICKS.

name: theoneyouwant
text: A comment left by theoneyouwant was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by norm, davidbs, Zem)

name: fivepercent
text: Fuck you Friday has become a tradition at my job.  It has expanded to encompass every day of the week.

name: sargasm
text: My 21st birthday party, which fell on a Friday, was officially a Fuck You Friday party.  Nobody understood why I was saying Fuck You to everyone, but it was worth it.

name: catachresis
text: Pat's trail mix always deserves a Fuck You.

name: rodneystubbs
text: "I'll expect you in five minutes" Fuck You, Pat.  And anyone who would ever say that.

name: petitegitan
text: Man, I bet the drive through person was thoroughly confused. "All I did was offer that dude some cheesecake!"

name: pissinducats
text: Ray is showing some wicked sack, all saying "fuck you" to someone who's about to handle his food. I wonder if Meal # 2 got the arms and backs treatment...

name: pissinducats
text:
Goddamnit, first post ever and I forget to mark it "pro" to accurately reflect how this asset made me feel!

Fuck me.

name: saru
text: No, fuck you, buddy, fuck you.

name: semiquaver
text:
With pleasure.
...
Sorry, it's "With pleasure" Thursday around here.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Mangtastic, jezebel, Doc_Rostov, tellumo)

name: spinynorman
text:
Some people are just not fuckin' fans of cheesecake. At hoity-toity bru-ha-has all over the place, the hostess has practiced her smile in the mirror hours before, because she knows when she spins through the crowd with little sections of brie and the odd piece of cheesecake a guy might eyeball the cheesecake and respond with a semi-apologetic, "Nawp. Fuck you." Guy could be a chairman of a hosptial, it don't matter none. That's just the workins of cheesecake in action.

It was so fucking hard not to write "cheesesteak" through all that. Fuck all y'all.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh holy crap. Oh my God. I've heard of cheesesteak before but never knew what it actually was or looked like. I finally decided to Google it and see if it looked as bad as I imagined it would, and it is so, so much worse. Augh. Auggh , I might vomit.

name: spinynorman
text:
A cheesesteak sandwich is actually really good.

Not the Philadelphia way, though. They make it with Cheez Whiz, which is just no good.

http://msnbcmedia3.msn.com/j/msnbc/Components/Photos/z_Projects_in_progress/060627_top10foods/060627_foods_cheesesteak.standard.jpg

I mean, it ain't health food, but it can be damn tasty.

name: steev_dayv
text: Can you prepare milksteak?

name: soticoto
text:
Looks to me like a steak sandwich with cheese in.
They sell those in Camden, and they're delicious.

name: closefriend
text: If I ever get rich enough to where I don't have to work again, every day will be Fuck You Friday, no matter where I am, even at a family reunion or  before a grand jury.

name: stuart
text: "Ladies and gentleman of the jury, allow me to speak for my client when I say: fuck you."

name: jezebel
text: "We, the jury, find the defendant... guilty.  Fuck you."

name: tripleg
text: too literal

name: machegav
text: Lack of this is what's wrong with the justice system.

name: varnish
text: It's always a good day to take old Fuck You out for a spin. It makes a good converstion complete.

name: stubob
text: It may not be Friday, but I think I may just go on a good old fashion Cussabout anyway.

name: girlandagun
text:
This is one of my favorite strips.
I keep it on my desktop and open it secretly whenever need be, read it over, smile, and relax.
I am a schoolteacher.

name: paco
text: Damn! So school teachers do have personalities, they just keep them hidden?

name: biff
text:
Speaking as a high school math teacher,

Fuck You.

name: atticusonline
text: You teach high school math? Fuck you, man.

name: vweep
text:
I like high school math!
Fuck you!

name: vweep
text:
Everyone, please note that this was my first attempt at using BBcode.

Also note that I kicked it's goddamn ass.

name: aperson
text: [i}Oh yeah?[i] Wow! [b]Big round of applause for vweep![b/]

name: aperson
text: damn

name: vweep
text:
A man of lesser scruples would say something along the lines of pwn.

Instead... fuck you!

name: atticusonline
text:
You keep your scruples to yourself!
Fuck You!

name: tekende
text:
And then you had to go ruin your triumph by inappropriately using an apostrophe.

Its , vweep, not it's.

name: theplaidknight
text: Plus, if we're getting really grammatically correct, it's "goddamned", but then no one gets that right anyway.

name: atticusonline
text: Gorrammit! Fuck youuuuuuuuuuuuu

name: epicurus
text: This is a very therapeutic practice.

name: paco
text: I gotta try this sometime

name: liquidcruelty
text: It would seem you could interchange "Namaste" and "Fuck you", if you're the sort to say Namaste, or if you just want to.  I think "fuck you" is clearer and more friendly than "Namaste" anyway

name: pohlhoud
text: I sure was glad i did

name: alessandro
text: this is the first achewood i ever read. now im hooked

name: _cheesekayke
text: The beginning of an era...

name: budenhagen
text: I'd say fuck you to someone too, if they offered me something made from stawberry, EVEN IF IT WAS THE POPE.

name: pseudochron
text: Fuck you.

name: presterjohn
text: But strawberry popes are delicious!

name: salo
text: Maaan, so much more delicious than the catholic ones!

name: brzbee
text: Hey, it's Milkin!

name: brzbee
text: Erm, i mean Milklin.

name: stuart
text:
Oh hey, I never realized that Milklin does in fact have two Ls in it (I thought you added the only missing L).

This exchange is why Milklin was rescinded.

name: stuart
text: Mikin sounds like some asshole Zelda NPC who wouldn't let you heal because you didn't have a certain sized wallet.

name: mindbnder
text: As today is friday Fuck You!

name: gumfish
text: Ray gets some late fast food, goes to bed, changes his mind and gets up to grill a steak, all in the time-frame of one glorious Friday.

name: gage
text: Looks like he's grilling up a Spaghetti's Dad to me.

name: lexsenthur
text: Pour some out for one's homies who are having a Fuck You Friday!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Thursday Blogs

Ray: What is it with eggs?
Onstad: What happens when you go on a walk.

name: firesign
text: This is just one more comment in a sea of other praise, but there really should be a feature here that bumps your post to the top of every comment section.

name: fermatprime
text: Fuck you! Spider Jerusalem wouldn't say that to his Filthy Assistant! I know it's not Friday but I'll say it again: Fuck you!

name: xiaomimi
text: If it would make you feel any better, fermatprime, you could always kick me in the head and demand more drugs after I've been posting blogs for five hours straight.

name: direhaggis
text:
"Take old Fuck You out for a spin today."

Life is a highway. Drive often.

name: drago25
text: Ray is wise beyond his cat years

name: jaredwilde
text:
One of my local radio stations has Fuck Your Friday. You call in to an automated recording thing, give your Fuck You, and they play them every Friday. I actually gave a Fuck You once, to an ex of mine. She actually heard it. And we worked together.

Not my finest moment

name: tekende
text: DiSaGrEeMeNt BoX

name: tripleoptics
text: sorry fella, fuck you.

name: dasilodavi
text: This is another one of those things that oddly stuck.  Judas Priest Friday, no.  Fuck you Friday, yes.  I guess FYF is just more accessible to the general public.

name: atypicaloracle
text: When Pat is around, every day ought to be Fuck You Friday.
